CpsDatepickerComponent.description: CpsDatepickerComponent is an input component to provide date input.

props.description: Defines the input properties of the component.

values.name: label
values.description: Label of the datepicker element.

values.name: disabled
values.description: Determines whether datepicker is disabled.

values.name: width
values.description: Width of the datepicker of type number denoting pixels or string.

values.name: placeholder
values.description: Placeholder text.

values.name: hint
values.description: Bottom hint text for the input field.

values.name: clearable
values.description: When enabled, a clear icon is displayed to clear the value.

values.name: hideDetails
values.description: Hides hint and validation errors.

values.name: persistentClear
values.description: Determines whether the component should have persistent clear icon.

values.name: showTodayButton
values.description: Determines whether to show button to be able to select today's date.

values.name: openOnInputFocus
values.description: Determines whether the datepicker dropdown should open on input focus.

values.name: infoTooltip
values.description: When it is not an empty string, an info icon is displayed to show text for more info.

values.name: infoTooltipClass
values.description: InfoTooltip class for styling.

values.name: infoTooltipMaxWidth
values.description: Size of infoTooltip, of type number denoting pixels or string.

values.name: infoTooltipPersistent
values.description: Determines whether the infoTooltip is persistent.

values.name: infoTooltipPosition
values.description: Position of infoTooltip, it can be "top", "bottom", "left" or "right".

values.name: appearance
values.description: Styling appearance of datepicker input, it can be 'outlined', 'underlined' or 'borderless.

values.name: minDate
values.description: Minimal date availalbe for selection.

values.name: maxDate
values.description: Maximal date availalbe for selection.

values.name: value
values.description: Value of the datepicker.

emits.description: Defines emit that determine the behavior of the component based on a given condition or report the actions that the component takes.

values.name: valueChanged
values.description: Callback to invoke on value change.

types.description: Defines the custom types used by the module.

values.name: CpsDatepickerAppearanceType
values.description: CpsDatepickerAppearanceType is used to define the border of the datepicker input.
